response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value and the potential impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate, tailored to meet your specific needs. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
